method.name: client_id
method.description: Optional. The Discord application ID for your game. Defaults to the value set by [method DiscordClient.set_application_id].

method.name: scopes
method.description: Scopes is a space separated string of the oauth scopes your game is requesting. Most games should just pass in [method DiscordClient.get_default_communication_scopes] or [method DiscordClient.get_default_presence_scopes] which will include these scopes, respectively: [code]openid sdk.social_layer[/code] or [code]openid sdk.social_layer_presence[/code] [code]sdk.social_layer[/code] and [code]sdk.social_layer_presence[/code] automatically expand to include all the necessary scopes for the integration. You can pass in additional scopes if you need to, but as a general rule you should only request the scopes you actually need, and the user will need to grant access to those additional scopes as well.
